postActions.description: Rename script template to PowerShell script

manualInstructions.text: Replace dots with underscores in Projects references in AppHost/Program.cs

args.args: -NonInteractive -Command "$appHostFile = Get-ChildItem -Path 'src' -Recurse -Filter 'Program.cs' | Where-Object { $_.DirectoryName -match 'AppHost' } | Select-Object -First 1; if ($appHostFile) { $content = Get-Content -Path $appHostFile.FullName -Raw; $pattern = 'Projects\.([^_\s]+)\.([^_\s]+)'; $replacement = 'Projects.$1_$2'; $content = $content -replace $pattern, $replacement; Set-Content -Path $appHostFile.FullName -Value $content; Write-Host 'AppHost project references fixed successfully.' }"

-NonInteractive -Command "$appHostFile = Get-ChildItem -Path 'src' -Recurse -Filter 'Program.cs' | Where-Object { $_.DirectoryName -match 'AppHost' } | Select-Object -First 1; if ($appHostFile) { $content = Get-Content -Path $appHostFile.FullName -Raw; $solutionFileName = Get-ChildItem -Path '.' -Filter '*.sln' | Select-Object -First 1; $projectNameBase = $solutionFileName.BaseName; $projectNameLower = $projectNameBase.ToLowerInvariant().Replace('.', '-'); Write-Host 'Replacing modular-aspire with '$projectNameLower; $content = $content -replace 'modular-aspire', $projectNameLower; Set-Content -Path $appHostFile.FullName -Value $content; Write-Host 'Container prefixes updated successfully to '$projectNameLower }"
